name: Barcelona Tapas Tour
description: Our tapas route will take you to the inside of the vivid social life in Barcelona. We will take you around the old town of Barcelona, guiding through the narrow streets of the Barri Gòtic and El Born where we will go from one restaurant to another, enjoying the amazing experience of Spanish and Catalan food. These carefully selected tapas bars, serving the famous Spanish cuisine, represent the traditions and customs of different Spanish provinces. It is a great chance to discover the traditions and culture of food and drinks typical for Spain, Catalonia and Barcelona.
